abstract: Martin O’Malley, the former Maryland governor who’s also in a rock ’n’ roll band, plans to officially declare himself a candidate seeking the Democratic Party’s presidential nomination in Baltimore on Saturday.

headline.main: Martin O’Malley Tunes Up for Announcement With ‘Hail to the Chief’

snippet: Martin O’Malley, the former Maryland governor who’s also in a rock ’n’ roll band, plans to officially declare himself a candidate seeking the Democratic Party’s presidential nomination in Baltimore on Saturday.
